title: KFC's New 'Secret Menu' Burger Has Landed: Here's How To Get It
text:
Image: Sir Eats A Lot

If you weren't already privy to KFC's secret menu, you can access it through the fast food chain's app through some careful manoeuvring. Its latest secret burger has just been released and it's the perfect choice for ultra carnivores who don't care about carbs. Here's how to sink your teeth into it.

How To Access KFC's Secret Menu Secret menus are pretty awesome. You get access to tasty morsels most people don't realise exist, making you part of a culinary illuminati. KFC has a secret menu. As well as the The Nug-a-Lot, there's an entire menu of secret goodness. Here's how to access that menu and join KFC's secret society. Read more

KFC has announced the 'Hot Or Not' burger is now available through its shadowy secret menu. As with all previous secret menu items, it's only available for for a short time.

Essentially, the burger will come with both an Original Recipe fillet and a Zinger fillet. Also slapped on is a sorta spicy sauce with the standard fare of mayo, cheese, bacon and lettuce.

"We know how much our fans love a Zinger Burger, but not everyone's tastebuds can commit to its spiciness," KFC's CMO Kristi Woolrych said in a media release. "We want everyone to be able to enjoy the delicious and original taste of our famous Zinger flavouring. [It's the] perfect burger for anyone who's keen to maybe spice things up... but only by a little bit."

Previous incarnations have included triple-fillet monster called the Triple Stacker as well as a literal chicken nugget burger.

Image: Lifehacker Australia

How do I access KFC's secret menu again?

Download the KFC app from the Apple or Google Play Store

Start the app and hit the Order Now button

button Search for a nearby KFC store

Once you've found a store, tap on the Order button

button When you see the menu, pull the menu down until you see a cartoon version of Colonel Sanders and hold for about 11 seconds

When you release, you'll see the Secret Menu
